personalizations.subject: Your mind-match at Neuromatch Conference is ready [demo]

content.value:
Dear participant,

We have matched you to 6 more participants at the conference. Please log-in and check your match at https://neuromatch.io/your-matches. You can see the instructions how to start your conversation with your peers on https://neuromatch.io/instructions/how-to-register.
